casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

September 6, 2007

[Cite as 09/06/2007 Case Announcements, 2007-Ohio-4569.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2007-1527. State v. White.

Ashland App. No. 2006-COA-014, 2007-Ohio-3424. This cause is pending before the court as a death penalty postconviction appeal. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for appointment of counsel,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is denied.
